name: Tamed: The Unseen Show
description:
Tamed: The Unseen Show

Tamed is a 3D Puzzle Stealth side scroller where you play as a tiny clown with a rattle for a head. Can you use your head to find out what’s happening behind the show?

Story

The story follows a clown through the circus he works in. To the public it’s just an ordinary circus but they have no idea what’s happening behind the scenes, nor how some elements are treated.

Developer Team Credits

  • Game Designer - Rodrigo Lopes
  • Game Artist - Diogo Silva
  • Game Developer - Gonçalo Matos

Music and Sound FX Credits

  • Lead Sound Designer - Miguel Bastos
  • Sound Designer - Beatriz Bernardo
  • Sound Designer - Diogo Couto
  • Sound Designer - Pedro Coutinho
